item.title: Vodafone Idea’s Shares Decline After Supreme Court Defers AGR Hearing Again
item.description: The next hearing is scheduled for October 27. Analyst said the stock remains speculative and is likely to trade sideways near key moving averages.

item.title: Boeing Stock Rises Premarket: Trump Floats Using Planemaker As Negotiating Tool
item.description: The deal could jeopardize an expected order of about 500 jets from various airlines from Asia's biggest economy.

item.title: TMQ, CRML, USAR: Lithium, Rare Earth Stocks Rally Premarket As US-China Trade Dispute Heats Up
item.description: Trilogy Metals gained 11.3%, Critical Metals stock jumped 18% and USA Rare Earth shares soared 22.5%.

item.title: StubHub Stock Rises Premarket On Bullish Analyst Calls — Can It Flip Retail Sentiment?
item.description: The first set of analysts to begin coverage on the stock is optimistic.
